import React, { useState } from 'react' import Wrapper from '../assets/wrappers/RegisterPage' import { FormRow, WhiteLogo } from '../Component' const Register = () => { const initialstate = { name : "", email : "", password : '', isMember : true, } const [values,SetValues] = useState(initialstate) const toggleMember = () => { SetValues({ ...values, isMember: !values.isMember }) } const handleChange = (e) =>{ SetValues({...values,[e.target.name]:e.target.values}) console.log({name,}) } const handleSubmit = (e) =>{ e.preventDefault() console.log(e.target) } return (

{values.isMember?"Login":"Register"}

) } export default Register
